page.title: 11Thoughts on Presteigne
page.content: Presteigne is far away from any really big towns and it is hard to get to them.Knighton is the nearest town. It is hard to drive down the main street of Presteigne because of the cars parked there,more{car parks}are needed.I also think that Presteigne should be left alone because it is being spoilt by lots of adventurous ideas.It is a little{rural town}and it should stay that way.There should also be more{public footpath.}Presteigne is a lovely place to walk around if only you could without being shouted at by a farmer. The town has plenty of{shops}and the jams on the High Street have been relieved by the{new by-pass.} I don't think there could be anywhere more {peaceful}than Presteigne. Written by Catherine Hatfield.
